name: places/ChIJuXmtZYlZwokRGJhQjYSnZvQ
adrFormatAddress: 118 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: les doy una estrella me gustaría cero , pero no da la opción muy mala experiencia ,era la primera vez que compraba  porque se ve un lugar muy bueno , yo trabajo en 639 Vanderbilt limpiando y ya días tenía la intención de ir a comprar a ese lugar y hoy a las 8.45 que termine fui, a comprar un rollo con huevo,  que me preguntaron que si quería otra cosa y les dije que si bacon , pero que creen que me dieron mi roll solo con bacon y  un queso barato , y me cobraron casi 7 dolares, . y que paso con el.huevo..no se si lo hizo la persona con intención porque somos hispanos , es un lugar donde van puros gente blancos..

text.text: I give them one star, I would like zero, but it doesn't give the option a very bad experience, it was the first time I bought because it looks like a very good place, I work at 639 Vanderbilt cleaning and for days I had the intention of going shopping at that place and today at 8:45 I finished I went to buy a roll with egg, they asked me if I wanted something else and I told them yes bacon, but they think they gave me my roll only with bacon and a cheap cheese, and they charged me almost 7 dollars, . And what happened to the egg... I don't know if the person did it intentionally because we are Hispanic, it is a place where only white people go...
